title: Energy in circuit - U-ef in wires and resistor

content.prompt: When a battery and a resistor are connected together by conducting wires in a single-loop circuit, an electric field is generated within the circuit. Which of the following statements is true about the electric potential energy Ue-f for the system composed of the circuitâ€™s electric field and a single electron moving through the circuit?

choices.label: Ue-f increases by a nonnegligible amount when the electron moves through one of the conducting wires.
Ue-f decreases by a nonnegligible amount when the electron moves through one of the conducting wires.
Ue-f increases by a nonnegligible amount when the electron moves through the resistor.
Ue-f decreases by a nonnegligible amount when the electron moves through the resistor.
